mapper.update: update employee set EmployeeENL = #{employeeenl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EmployeeName = #{employeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EmployeeNameLL = #{employeenamell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MobilePhone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SupervisorENL = #{supervisorenl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TelPhone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, EmployeeENL, EmployeeName, EmployeeNameLL, Email, Status, MobilePhone, SupervisorENL, Position, TelPhone from employee where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, EmployeeENL, EmployeeName, EmployeeNameLL, Email, Status, MobilePhone, SupervisorENL, Position, TelPhone from employee
